description: Staying warm is the key to ensuring that every outdoor adventure is fun. That’s why having a good hat is imperative. The Kids’ Stripe Pom Beanie is a perfect choice. It offers the thermoregulation and cozy softness of Merino wool plus the durability of recycled nylon. Its dual stripes give it a classic look, while its pom makes it a little whimsical. It’s a hat kids will love to wear.
name: Stripe Pom Beanie - Kids

specs.value: 55% Merino Wool, 45% Recycled Polyester. Exclusive of Decoration
